info.description: Manage your things with the thang
info.title: Managerie API

get.description: Finds configurations with any user defined filters applied.

post.description: Allows the creation of a new configuration

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: configuration to create

get.description: Finds a specific configuration based on its id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the configuration to fetch

put.description: Updates a configuration based on the id with the data sent

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the configuration to update

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: fields of configuration to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the configuration to destroy

get.description: Finds devices with any user defined filters applied.

post.description: Allows the creation of a new device

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: device to create

get.description: Finds a specific device based on its id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the device to fetch

put.description: Updates a device based on the id with the data sent

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the device to update

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: fields of device to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the device to destroy

get.description: Finds devicetypes with any user defined filters applied.

post.description: Allows the creation of a new devicetype

parameters.name: devicetype
parameters.description: devicetype to create

get.description: Finds a specific devicetype based on its id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the devicetype to fetch

put.description: Updates a devicetype based on the id with the data sent

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the devicetype to update

parameters.name: devicetype
parameters.description: fields of devicetype to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the devicetype to destroy

get.description: Gets devices associated with a devicetype

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: id of the devicetype to get devices for

post.summary: Adds a device to a devicetype
post.description: Attaches the posted device to the specified devicetype

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: id of the devicetype to add the new device to

parameters.name: devicetype
parameters.description: fields of device to create and attach to the devicetype

post.summary: Adds the device to a devicetype
post.description: Attaches the posted device to the specified devicetype

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: id of the devicetype to add a device to

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the device to associate

delete.summary: Removes an device from a devicetype
delete.description: Removes the specified device from the specifieddevicetype

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: id of the devicetype to remove device from

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the device to disassociate

get.description: Finds locations with any user defined filters applied.

parameters.description: location to create

parameters.description: id of the location to fetch

put.description: Updates a location based on the id with the data sent

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the location to update

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: fields of location to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the location to destroy

get.description: Gets devices associated with a location

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: id of the location to get devices for

post.summary: Adds a device to a location
post.description: Attaches the posted device to the specified location

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: id of the location to add the new device to

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: fields of device to create and attach to the location

post.summary: Adds the device to a location
post.description: Attaches the posted device to the specified location

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: id of the location to add a device to

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the device to associate

delete.summary: Removes an device from a location
delete.description: Removes the specified device from the specifiedlocation

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: id of the location to remove device from

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the device to disassociate

whereParam.name: where
whereParam.description: JSON encode WHERE criteria objects. Example: where={"name":{"contains":"theodore"}}

limitParam.name: limit
limitParam.description: The maximum number of records to send back. Example: limit=100

skipParam.name: skip
skipParam.description: The number of records to skip. Example: skip=30

callbackParam.name: callback
callbackParam.description: If specified, a JSONP response will be sent (instead of JSON). This is the name of a client-side javascript function to call, to which results will be passed as the first (and only) argument. Example: ?callback=my_JSONP_data_receiver_fn
